name: Pixel Pro Ski Jump
description:
Shoot down a variety of ramps, carefully balancing for maximum speed until timing your leap into the snow-filled air. For top style points, you’ll need to keep balancing while airborne too.

In Single Event mode, you can take a quick jump on the 90m, 120m and “Ski Flying” hills. Game Center leaderboards are included - so you can try to break the world records for distances and scores.

But the best way to play is in Career mode. You begin in the 90m championship, competing in 20 events around the globe, each with slightly different conditions. There's prize money to be earned If you place in the top 10. You can use the winnings to upgrade your equipment, making for longer and more satisfying jumps. If you place high enough at the end of the season, the 120m and Ski Flying championships will be unlocked.

FEATURES:
Quick Jump mode
Career mode
20 locations worldwide
Variable conditions
Unlockable equipment
Unlockable 90m, 120m and “Ski Flying” hills.
Game Center leaderboards and world records
Game Center achievements
Landscape or portrait play on iPad
